ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: unleashing upon them flock after flock of birds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And sent hordes of chargers flying against them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And He sent against them swarms of birds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by sending against them flocks of swallows
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And send flocks of birds upon them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He sent against them birds, in flocks (Ababil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And send down (to prey) upon them birds in flocks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And He loosed upon them birds in flights,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And send against them swarms of flying creatures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and send against them flocks of birds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He sent against them birds in flocks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and send against them flocks of birds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He sent against them Flights of Birds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And sent against them birds, in flocks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And He sent against them flights of birds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He sent against them swarms of birds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [105:3] and unleashed upon them swarms of birds, [birds] in droves, one following the next (it is said there is no singular form for it [abābīl], like asātīr; but some say that the singular is abūl or ibāl or ibbīl, similar [in constructed pattern] to ‘ajūl, miftāh and sikkīn),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And send against them) and set on them (swarms of flying creatures) in succession, 773
